targets.query: SELECT "status", "fr", "ie", "pause", "pPulmMax", "pPlate", "peep", "vc", "fio2", "crs" FROM "ventilator_measurement" WHERE ("ventilator" =~ /^$ventilator$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ventilator" ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
